entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] GC suspension issues with System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests #70115
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes in exception clauses #70109
  • [System.Text.Json] DeserializeAsyncEnumerable is delayed emitting objects when writing asynchronously to stream #70107
  • Should we have the Convert class support the newly introduced numeric types? #70104
  • JIT: cloning invariant analysis seems oddly limited #70100
  • native-managed HResult incompatibility #70099
  • HttpConnectionPool contention for HTTP/1.1 #70098
  • Build: generate layout does not copy runtime libraries #70096
  • [Native AOT] LINK : fatal error LNK1102: out of memory and Failed to load type #70092
  • TypedReference.ToObject tests failing on Mono #70091
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Quic connection keep alive #70090
  • [wasm] Split initial implementation draft PR #70085
  • Test Infrastructure Failure: System.IO.IOException: Unknown error 42424 #70079
  • WebProxy - UseDefaultCredentials - Set to false overwrites credentials #70083
  • Marshal.PtrToStructure intrinsic should make sure the ctor is reflectable #70072
    7.0.0
  • Fix GS cookie support #70071
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: MayIgnoreAttribute to enlighten IDE0058 #70064
  • Test failure System.Threading.Channels.Tests.SyncMultiReaderUnboundedChannelTests.ManyProducerConsumer_ConcurrentReadWrite_Success(numReaders: 10, numWriters: 1) #70061
  • Test failure System.Formats.Tar.Tests.TarWriter_WriteEntry_File_Tests.Add_File(format: Pax) #70060
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Implement mono support for default interface implementations of static virtual methods #70040
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault in LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests on coreclr/linux/arm64/debug #70112
  • Test failure System.Reflection.Tests.MethodInfoTests.CallStackFrame_AggressiveInlining #69835
    7.0.0
  • Stale error message: COR_E_LOADING_REFERENCE_ASSEMBLY #70074
  • [wasm] Stack overflow in `JIT/Directed/tailcall/tailcall/tailcall.sh` on Linux #69517
    7.0.0
  • Can't debug C native dependency of WASM Blazor #69599
    7.0.0
  • Sha512ManagedTests.Sha512_Fips180_3_Async is flaky #70058
  • Prefer Dictionary<K, V>.TryGetValue() over guarded indexer access #33798
    7.0.0
  • How can I declare an interop COM interface as "agile"? #69979
  • [API Proposal]: Let the application author tell us to be idle. #66037
    7.0.0
  • Support arrays in `mono_reflection_create_custom_attr_data_args_noalloc` #52977
    7.0.0
  • Unresolved CppInlinenamespaceAttribute when linking.. #70077
  • StopTheHostException should be made public to be dealt with gracefully #60600
    7.0.0
  • [Mono][Android][Interp] Missing dll - Could not load file or assembly 'xunit.performance.core, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=67066efe964d3b03' or one of its dependencies. #55528
    Future
  • What was the reason to inject DispatchTailCalls method after profiler instrumentation in .NET 7.0? #70013
    7.0.0
  • Missing docker image `fedora-34-helix-20220523150939-4f64125` in mcr #70005
  • Test failure System.Net.NameResolution.Tests.GetHostAddressesTest_Cancellation.DnsGetHostAddresses_PostCancelledToken_Throws #69993
  • NativeAOT does not respect STAThreadAttribute/MTAThreadAttribute on main entry point #70066
    7.0.0
  • In Debug HttpUtility.UrlDecode double-decodes while WebUtility.UrlDecode does not. #70018
  • Infinite recursion in System.Private.CoreLib #53833
    Future
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #69653
    7.0.0
  • ARM32/ARM64 gcstress-extra failures #69657
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.Reflection.Tests timeout/hang #69476
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/GetTotalPauseDuration/GetTotalPauseDuration.sh #69662

PullRequests

Created

  • fix InstanceDataCollectionCollection_CopyTo by retrying on 0 values #70119
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • Enabling System.Threading tests for NativeAOT #70118
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Upgrade SDK to 7.0.100-preview.5.22276.4 #70117
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use key properties to determine ECC key size for Apple #70116
    area-System.Security
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #70114
    area-System.Reflection
  • Exempt MemberNotNullWhen from genapi ref assembly requirements #70113
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
  • Add exception interop test for validating native exception interop on Windows + CoreCLR. #70110
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Update test to stop expecting removed diagnostics #70106
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-bug
  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thinks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Fix VTableCallHolder writeable mapping size with W^X #70103
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support new hot reload features #70097
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-EnC-mono
  • Optimize `HashCode.AddBytes` for inputs larger than 16 bytes. #70095
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Disable flaky DNS cancellation tests during jitstress #70089
    area-System.Net
  • Don't explicitly link ICU into Mono on FreeBSD #70088
    area-Build-mono
  • Update Roslyn to pick up recent features / bug fixes / design changes #70087
  • [wasm] Initial SIMD support #70086
    area-Build-mono, needs-author-action
  • Improve DisplayNameHelpers for NativeAOT #70084
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix linker ref param warnings #70082
    area-Meta
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Tag dotnet/jit-contrib on area-CodeGen-coreclr issues #70076
    area-Meta
  • JIT ARM32: Fix passing odd sized structs from arbitrary sources #70075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Enable test that already fixed #70065
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Feature/add event to minmax threads config #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [mono] Enable -Werror=shorten-64-to-32 #70062
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Host error message updates #70059
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x

Merged

  • CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [wasm-ep] Implement EventSource counters support; add an EventPipeSessionOptions builder to TS #69567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Revert "[mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter (#68823)" #69866
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Make gcunsafe for cpblk if it has gc pointers #70069
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Avoid tailcall optimization in invoke test #70108
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Move docs about building different form factors to the top #70102
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove more uses of StringBuilderCache #69683
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Make gcunsafe for cpblk if it has gc pointers #70053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix state reference of reflection-only loader context #70094
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix runtime test failing due to the app running in debug mode #70050
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix VTableCallHolder writeable mapping size with W^X #70093
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Creating comma temps differently for SubMulDiv morph #69770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugging] Adding instructions for native debugging #69873
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Aggressive GC #69695
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support array parameter types of custom attributes in Mono AOT compiler #69759
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [Android][test] Enable mandelbrot-7 on Android x64 with interp #69915
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix flakyness of DnsGetHostAddresses_PostCancelledToken_Throws #70044
    area-System.Net
  • Fix STAThreadAttribute/MTAThreadAttribute on main entry point not respected by NativeAOT #70067
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure we do not corrupt RAX for CFG dispatcher on x64 #70016
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix fgCanTailCallViaJitHelper #70033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect docker tack for fedora 34 helix image #70011
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ILogWriter interface to ilc and crossgen #69609
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add NativeAOT info to dump debugging template #70070
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix compilation error in VS 17.3.1 #69994
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Use void* for array pinning #70048
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Exclude GetTotalPauseDuration from GCStress #70037
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Move Format property to TarEntry and allow multiple Global Extended Attributes entries #69933
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Add leg to build wasm with threading enabled #68787
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix some scaling issues with the global queue in the thread pool #69386
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method tests. #70002
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix entrypoint breakpoint when it's an async method #69856
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add retry mechanism to test execution process #70023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #70034
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reenable 4244 warning for Mono. #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add ZipArchiveEntry.IsEncrypted for password-protection detection #70036
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Support more primitive type converters #70057
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable Expression tests for NativeAOT #69945
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add hot/cold splitting test job to jit-runtime-experimental #69922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use u8 in more places #69995
    area-Meta
  • Ensure side effects get spilled for the various hwintrinsic and simdashwintrinsic nodes #70054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #69833
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix MemoryPool<byte>.Shared.MaxBufferSize seems incorrect #61755
    area-System.Buffers
  • Fix ICorDebugFunction2::GetVersionNumber for arm32. #69901
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics
  • Type activator should be order agnostic #67493
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Latest msquic interop #69876
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Move TypeReference.ToObject to managed (CoreCLR) #70055
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix build issues after enabling TRACE_GC #69766
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement DbDataSource #70006
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Draft] Fix hard link creation in tar tests in Android, iOS, tvOS #69416
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70041
    area-System.Security
  • Optimize `System.Reflection.Metadata.ByteSequenceComparer`. #70047
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #69902
    breaking-change, area-Setup, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • More lib testing with native AOT #69132
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Decouple TimeOnlyConverter from TimeSpanConverter #70035
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Svm diamond shape without mono exclusion #70045
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update CentOS7 image #69892
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reflection.Metadata.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #69999
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Wasm AOT micro optimizations #69955
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet workload update --print-download-link-only --sdk-version with 6.0.400 do not return results for previous sdk band #25774
  • dotnet workload update --print-download-link-only --sdk-version 6.0.400-preview.22301.10 #25773
  • dotnet workload list --machine-readable with 6.0.400 preview do not list installed workloads from previous sdk band #25772
  • Add an `-lp` option alias to `dotnet run` for `--launch-profile` #25770
  • [Package Validation] Enable nullable reference types #25760
  • ContentFiles not included with multiple TargetFrameworks and --no-incremental after upgrading to 6.0.300 #25758
  • PublishTrimmed is set too late when AOT publishing #25740
    7.0.1xx

Closed

  • Feature request: Add ability to build solution filter #10409
    Backlog
  • Error "Unable to find package about 5.0.18" when creating 5.0 project on VS 17.0/17.2 VAL build which carries 5.0.17 runtime #25672

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.1xx-preview5] Integrate new user-jwts tool into SDK #25771
    Servicing-consider, Area-AspNetCore
  • Compatibility tooling refactoring #25765
  • [main] Integrate dotnet user-jwts tools into SDK #25757
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update man pages #25755

Merged

  • Support PublicKey metadata on InternalsVisibleTo #25000
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the last non-helix test over to running on helix. #25324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Replace hardcoded error string in source with string from resources #25372
    localization, area-Meta
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch NuGet assets for tests as tools to be under the test execution directory #25729
  • Fix workload updates failing due to packages not found. #25727
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • simplify arch for preload library #24870
  • Add fallback root certificate bundle for code signing and timestamping #25687
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Include requested .NET SDK version when known #25733
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add tests to cover the resolution of AnalysisLevel known-strings #25454
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.0 to the current framework #25476
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rules to catch addition or removal of 'virtual' modifier #25734
    Area-Compatibility

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-01
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Adjust required members visibility specification #6190

Merged

  • fix: wrong class-name in Open Questions code example #6188

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'CSharpWrappingCodeRefactoringProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled. #61642
  • Private Property incorrectly marked as unused in VB.NET VS 2022 IDE0051 #61640
  • Shift+Alt+F10 for adding missing using directives does not always work inside csharp XML documentation comments #61639
  • Can't add semi-colon to end of line #61638
  • Add EditAndContinueMethodDebugInformation.Create overload that takes compressedStateMachineStateMap #61636
  • CodeGenerator.TryEmitReadonlySpanAsBlobWrapper - doesn't record dependencies from UseSiteInfo for utilized well known methods #61631
  • Code cleanup (C#) with new line preferences doesn't remove all empty lines #61629
  • Show where a thrown error may be caught, akin to find usages. #61628
  • Add convert unused parameter to discard to code cleanup #61627
  • Add 'automatically remove closing curly bracket when corresponding opening curly bracket has been removed' feature #61626
  • Warning to programmer about sync Task return in c# #61625

Closed

  • Building skeleton assemblies appears to be much more expensive now that we have generators. #61226
    Compiler.Next
  • Language version check is missing for an implicit implementation of a static virtual member #61598
    C# 11.0
  • Possible race in an Assert recently added to Compilation.GetTypeByMetadataName #59395
    17.3
  • API Additions for Required Members #61444
    C# 11.0
  • Local named "required" in top-level statements #61510
    C# 11.0
  • Revise `FindImplementationForInterfaceMember` for abstract statics #60704
    17.3
  • Test `SourceGeneration.SyntaxAwareGeneratorTests.Syntax_Provider_Doesnt_Attribute_Incorrect_Timing` is flaky #61540
  • Getting Speculative SemanticModel for method body method declaration without body (block or expression) is impossible #61564
  • xml doc `cref` can't disambiguate types based on visibility like method body can #61478
  • Use shift mask for shift operations with native integers #43347
    17.3
  • Need to make CodeLens tagger not tag files that are not visible. #60651
    17.3
  • Create Find-References API overload that allows searching for references to multiple symbols at once. #60984
    17.3
  • `cref` block is disallowed when the referenced member of type contains any unconstrainted generic argument with nullable annotation #61076
    Backlog
  • Unable to evaluate an outer constant inside a local function #61624
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Cache the AssemblyMetadata produced for any given compilation #61645
    Area-IDE
  • Emit error when function pointer invocation is encountered in an expression tree #61644
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Function Pointers
  • Calculate containing type effective accessibility for required member enforcement #61643
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Mention sharplab in bug template #61637
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation
  • Semantic Snippets - Fix bug where trigger character and start of snippet intersect #61633
    Area-IDE
  • Update compiler to supported UnmanagedMemoryStream when creating ModuleMetadata. #61630
    Area-IDE
  • Reducing allocations in completion #61620
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Perform language version check for an implicit implementation of a static virtual member #61601
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Simplify the code for synchronizing the workspace with OOP. #61634
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61641
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61623
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove obsolete external access API now that intellicode has switched over #61635
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Move the semantics checks of Inheritance margin to OOP #61592
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, Next
  • Update "file types" branch from main #61610
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update comment #61614
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove weak references in skeleton reference cache. #61608
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update PublishData.json #61632
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Snap 17.3 P2 #61618
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61621
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update config file for 17.3 P2 snapping #61619
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61622
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add an option to control if compilations are cloned when making skeletons #61613
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Semantic Snippets - Remove reflection and call the LanguageServerSnippetExpander directly #61491
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61617
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update 'Rename's commit behavior to be async. #61549
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • [LSP] Utilize list of all classification types + expose types to Razor #61395
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61648
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix cancellation leaks #20111
    Area-IDE, cla-already-signed
  • Report a warning for multiple matches for implicit interface implementation of static member #61607
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers
  • Include local-functions in the go-to index. #61568
    Area-IDE
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61616
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [EPIC] Revisiting HTTPS defaults in ASP.NET Core #41990
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add `IAuthenticationConfigurationProvider.GetAuthenticationConfiguration` #41989
  • Add support for specifying a launch profile to `dotnet watch run` #41988
  • Update project templates so that separate launch profiles for HTTP and HTTPS are configured #41982
    7.0-preview6
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #41980
  • user-jwts should just create the UserSecretsId if not found #41975
  • user LDAP GlobalCatalog to get user groups and add them to ClaimPrincipal. #41974
  • Support O DateTime(Offset) format in dotnet user-jwts tool #41973
  • DataProtection DPAPI NG fails to decrypt values after cloning VM to a different network location #41970
  • EventCallback not initiated #41967
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #41964
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery should word in (non routable) components and two-way #41963
  • Exclude css isolation assets from `dotnet publish` #41961
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • builder.Services.AddHostedService<TimerBackgroundService>(); has no effect #41860
  • RedisHubLifetimeManager OnDisconnectedAsync Exception #41104
    7.0-preview6
  • Cannot load blazor in an angular app #40245
    6.0.x
  • Unable to read appsettings using appcmd.exe #41596
  • .NET 6 Blazor IBrowserFile's OpenReadStream().ReadAsync(buffer) not able to read all bytes #41875
    6.0.x
  • Blazor WASM input time fails to show values after upgrade to .NET 5 #30507
    Backlog
  • [Feature Request] Remove magic strings from RazorPages routing #41930
  • VS Code: Problem windows has some errors after creating a Razor/Blazor project. #41965
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #41931
  • [Discussion] [Breaking change]: Updated empty body detection in MVC Model Binding #41014
    Discussions
  • SignalR tests fail against OpenSSL 3.0 #36921
    .NET 7 Planning
  • The respository does not build with `node` version 18 installed. #41571

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport 39275 to release/6.0 #41993
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Backport Blazor boot config fix #41992
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Blazor Make Default Template Favicon Blazor Logo #41991
    area-mvc
  • Add support for reading default scheme from config #41987
  • Mark changes in `.github` folder with `area-infrastructure` label #41981
    area-infrastructure
  • Revert "Check the environment on Helix" #41977

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement Stacked CardView #7675
  • Android Switch view has inconsistent colors when "off" #7673
  • Not able to link .a iOS library #7670
  • CollectionView scrolling doesn't work when inside stacklayout but works when inside a grid #7669
  • LayoutChildren Method does not respect the values that are given in #7668
  • [Windows] Shell FlyoutIcon doesn't change the hamburger Icon for Flyout #7667
  • Changing the UserAppTheme does not change the colours appropriately #7664
  • No maui template in list #7661
  • Maui media picker on Windows Platform error #7660
  • VSCode/CLI Support for running MAUI apps on Windows just like Mac #7659
  • Undesired behaviour of FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory #7657
  • [Layout] Label Rotation=90 does not work on Windows, strange results on Android #7656
  • Image Downsize does not treat image rotation as expected #7654
  • Maui Nightly builds #7653
  • Dialog box for method DisplayPromptAsync is displayed abnormally in windows machine #7650

Closed

  • The Placeholder property of IPlaceholder is currently read-only (allow it to be modified) #7662
  • Setting Border Height/Width at runtime causes unhandled exception #7655
    6.0-sr1
  • Vertical CollectionView should not attempt to scroll horizontally #6707
    6.0-servicing
  • iOS CollectionView selects Items SelectionMode="None" #7614
    6.0-servicing

    6.0-servicing
  • Image clipping not working correctly on Android #6527

    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr1
  • Hide non visible shell parts from VO #7512
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0-sr1
  • Updated the VS-target #7649

    blocker, p/0, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr1
  • [CollectionView] Make sure we map MapSelectionMode and SelectedITems #7658
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7648
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Update to .NET 7 SDKs #7375
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Propagate semantics to CV Item container #7539
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0-sr1
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.8 to 4.13.2 #7532
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 7
  • More info on templates #7430
    area/templates 📄, 6.0-sr1
  • [Android] Correctly notify CheckBox Color changes #7084
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr1
  • [Android] Implement quit Application #7633

  • [Android] Fix Button CornerRadius issue #7215
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0-sr1
  • [iOS] Expose ApplicationSignificantTimeChange method in lifecycle events #7526

  • [iOS] Fix issue updating Slider Maximum value #7610
